body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes         NPS  Free!  Â       Every Kid in a Park This initiative allows every fourth grade student and his or her family to visit over 2,000 federal lands-such as national parks, national forests, and national wildlife refuges-for free! For additional information, and to print off a paper pass, visit everykidinapark.gov.
title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: Fees & Passes
